short_summary: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for Airfield Roof Drive System (ARDI) and Airfield Lighting control & Monitoring System (ALCMS) Replacement 4 Wing Cold Lake
description: DEFENCE CONSTRUCTION CANADA (DCC) \\ndash\\n #CL220012 \\ndash\\nAdvance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for Airfield Lighting control & monitoring System (ALCMS) and Constant Current Regulatory (CCR) Replacement 4 Wing Cold Lake, Alberta .An Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) allows Defence Construction Canada to post a notice, for no less than fifteen calendar days, indicating to the supplier community that it intends to award a goods contract to a pre-identified contractor.\n
